title: Cornell study warns AI chatbots could sway elections, even persuading opposing voters more easily
description: Research has shown that artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini can be highly successful in shifting voter opinion. While at first the AI does back its claims with facts, it can also make up information just to persuade the voter.
content: The use of artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots like ChatGPT and Google Gemini is only increasing. All of us are using chatbots to gain information, or in some cases, even advice and AI, it seems, is happy to oblige. Recent research shows AI can giv... [2542 chars]

title: Meta partners with news outlets to expand AI content
description: Meta announced Friday it will integrate content from major news organizations into its artificial intelligence assistant to provide Facebook, Instagram
content:
Meta announced Friday it will integrate content from major news organizations into its artificial intelligence assistant to provide Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp users with real-time information.

title: NITI Aayog’s Frontier Tech Hub Releases Roadmap On Transforming India Into A Leading Quantum-Powered Economy
description: NITI Aayog’s Frontier Tech Hub released a roadmap on transforming India into a leading quantum-powered economy, noting that quantum technologies stand at the threshold of becoming one of the most transformative forces of our time. Quantum is not just another sector of innovation; it is the foundation of the next era of artificial intelligence, biotechnology, and advanced materials.
content: New Delhi: NITI Aayog’s Frontier Tech Hub on Thursday released a roadmap on transforming India into a leading quantum-powered economy, noting that quantum technologies stand at the threshold of becoming one of the most transformative forces of our ti... [3134 chars]

title: England World Cup draw: Could AI help Thomas Tuchel win 2026 tournament?
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.
content:
Artificial intelligence is making a big mark in elite football, and England are at the cutting edge when it comes to using it in the men's international game.

title: India's longevity and wellness sector gathers momentum with new founder
description: Among the early movers is Biopeak, a six-month-old longevity startup backed by Nikhil Kamath, Ranjan Pai's Claypond Capital and Accel's Prashanth Prakash, where artificial intelligence is already doing much of the heavy lifting.

title: U.S. senators unveil bill to prevent easing of curbs on Nvidia chip sales to China
description: A bipartisan group of U.S. senators unveiled a bill that would block the Trump administration from loosening rules that restrict Beijing’s access to artificial intelligence chips from Nvidia and AMD for 2.5 years.
content: A bipartisan group of U.S. senators, including prominent Republican China hawk Tom Cotton, on Thursday unveiled a bill that would block the Trump administration from loosening rules that restrict Beijing’s access to artificial intelligence chips from... [2366 chars]

title: Young shoppers fuel growth as brands turn to AI amid tariff pressures
description: Young consumers are boosting sales for brands like Warby Parker, Tapestry, and The Honest Company. Despite higher prices, younger shoppers are still buying essential items and accessories. Artificial intelligence is also improving company efficiency and profits. Executives shared these insights at the Reuters NEXT conference, looking ahead to 2026. This trend offers a positive outlook for brands navigating economic challenges.

title: EU regulators probe Meta move to block AI rivals from WhatsApp
description: EU regulators launched an antitrust investigation into Meta Platforms yesterday over its rollout of artificial intelligence features in its WhatsApp messenger that would block rivals, hardening Europe's already tough stance on Big Tech.
content:
EU regulators launched an antitrust investigation into Meta Platforms yesterday over its rollout of artificial intelligence features in its WhatsApp messenger that would block rivals, hardening Europe's already tough stance on Big Tech.
The move, rep... [265 chars]

title: Softbank's Son says super AI could make humans like fish, win Nobel Prize
description: SoftBank chief Masayoshi Son told South Korea’s president that future artificial super-intelligence could be thousands of times smarter than humans — leaving people “like fish” by comparison. He joked AI might even win a Nobel Prize in Literature. Son said ASI wouldn’t threaten humans, though President Lee admitted the idea was unsettling.

title: AI guru warns AI could kill 80 per cent of jobs soon, replacing surgeons, coders and even CEOs
description: AI pioneer Stuart Russell has expressed concerns over the potential impact of artificial intelligence on the job market. At a time when most tech companies have laid off thousands of employees, Russell believes that AI can one day even replace CEOs.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is changing the world as we speak. Fears of AI replacing jobs are common. Many big tech companies have already laid off thousands of employees in favour of greater AI integration. However, according to AI guru Stuart Russ... [2075 chars]
